name: Dolphin Up
description: A fun, vibrant, 2-minute game with surprising depth, Dolphin Up lets you do amazing tricks with a porpoise. Successful flips, spins and tailslides build speed, allowing you to jump higher and soar into the stars.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo equivalent or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better, OpenGL 2 compatible Storage: 55 MB available space Additional Notes: Screen Resolution of 1280x720 or higher.
